db:abstract.db:para: Contains classes that enable user input.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractActionInput
db:section.db:para: QAbstractActionInput is the base class for the Action Input and all Aggregate Action Inputs.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractAxisInput
db:section.db:para: QAbstractActionInput is the base class for all Axis Input.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractPhysicalDevice
db:section.db:para: QAbstractPhysicalDevice is the base class used by Qt3d to interact with arbitrary input devices.

db:section.db:title: class QAction
db:section.db:para: Links a set of QAbstractActionInput that trigger the same event.

db:section.db:title: class QActionInput
db:section.db:para: QActionInput stores Device and Buttons used to trigger an input event.

db:section.db:title: class QAnalogAxisInput
db:section.db:para: An axis input controlled by an analog input The axis value is controlled like a traditional analog input such as a joystick.

db:section.db:title: class QAxis
db:section.db:para: QAxis stores QAbstractAxisInputs used to trigger an input event.

db:section.db:title: class QAxisAccumulator
db:section.db:para: QAxisAccumulator processes velocity or acceleration data from a QAxis.

db:section.db:title: class QAxisSetting
db:section.db:para: QAxisSetting stores settings for the specified list of Axis.

db:section.db:title: class QButtonAxisInput
db:section.db:para: An axis input controlled by buttons The axis value is controlled by buttons rather than a traditional analog input such as a joystick.

db:section.db:title: class QInputAspect
db:section.db:para: Responsible for creating physical devices and handling associated jobs.

db:section.db:title: class QInputChord
db:section.db:para: QInputChord represents a set of QAbstractActionInput's that must be triggerd at once.

db:section.db:title: class QInputSequence
db:section.db:para: QInputSequence represents a set of QAbstractActionInput's that must be triggerd one after the other.

db:section.db:title: class QInputSettings
db:section.db:para: QInputSettings class holds the pointer to an input event source object.

db:section.db:title: class QKeyEvent
db:section.db:para: QKeyEvent event type send by KeyBoardHandler.

db:section.db:title: class QKeyboardDevice
db:section.db:para: QKeyboardDevice is in charge of dispatching keyboard events to attached QQKeyboardHandler objects.

db:section.db:title: class QKeyboardHandler
db:section.db:para: Provides keyboard event notification.

db:section.db:title: class QLogicalDevice
db:section.db:para: QLogicalDevice allows the user to define a set of actions that they wish to use within an application.

db:section.db:title: class QMouseDevice
db:section.db:para: Delegates mouse events to the attached MouseHandler objects.

db:section.db:title: class QMouseEvent
db:section.db:para: The Qt3DCore::QMouseEvent contains parameters that describe a mouse event.

db:section.db:title: class QMouseHandler
db:section.db:para: Provides a means of being notified about mouse events when attached to a QMouseDevice instance.

db:section.db:title: class QWheelEvent
db:section.db:para: The QWheelEvent class contains parameters that describe a mouse wheel event.

db:section.db:title: QKeyEventPtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QKeyEvent.

db:section.db:title: QMouseEventPtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QMouseEvent.

db:section.db:title: QWheelEventPtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QWheelEvent.
